comments.body: is this warning supposed to be attached to the `options` method? Just checking if it's accidentally copy-pasted from the method above.

Mmmh, good point... I intend to put the warning there but it could probably be rephrased as

> Instances of {@code EagerSession} returned by {@link EagerSession.Options.build()} must be explicitly freed...

Or it could be moved to `EagerSession.Options.build()`... what do you think?

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +298,302 @@ * Returns an object that configures and builds a {@code EagerSession} with custom options. * *

WARNING:Instances of {@code EagerSession} returned by this method must be explicitly freed * by invoking {@link #close()} when they are no longer needed. This could be achieve using * the `try-with-resources` technique.
